Tesla Announces Date for Second Quarter 2017 Financial Results and Webcast | Tesla Investor Relations Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Foundation Logo Cybertruck Logo Skip to main content Tesla homepage Investor Relations Skip to main content Dashboard Impact SEC Filings Corporate Governance Press Releases Account Press Releases Press Releases Back Tesla Announces Date for Second Quarter 2017 Financial Results and Webcast Globe Newswire Jul 11, 2017 &nbsp; PALO ALTO, Calif. , July 11, 2017 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Tesla (Nasdaq:TSLA)&nbsp;will post its financial results for the second quarter of 2017 after market close on Wednesday, August 2 nd, 2017. &nbsp;At that time, Tesla will issue a brief advisory containing a link to the Q2 2017 Update Letter, which will be available on the Tesla IR website. &nbsp;Tesla management will hold a live question and answer webcast that day at 2:30pm Pacific Time ( 5:30pm Eastern Time ) to discuss the Company's financial and business results and outlook. What:&nbsp; Date of Tesla Q2 2017 Financial Results and Q&amp;A Webcast &nbsp; When: Wednesday, August 2 nd, 2017 &nbsp; Time: 2:30pm Pacific Time / 5:30pm Eastern Time &nbsp; Shareholder Letter: &nbsp; http://ir.tesla.com &nbsp; Webcast:&nbsp; http://ir.tesla.com (live and replay) &nbsp; Approximately two hours after the Q&amp;A session, an archived version of the webcast will be available on the Company's website. For additional information, please visit ir.tesla.com . &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp; News Provided by Acquire Media Footer Tesla Â© 2026 Subscription Preferences Contact &amp; FAQ Privacy &amp; Legal
